catalog.name: eWater
catalog.title: eWater Portal
catalog.abstract: This GIS portal provides access to hydrogeological maps and well data of 12 EU countries. It was developed in frame of EC co-funded project "Multilingual cross-border access to ground water databases" (eWater)

catalog.name: FAO
catalog.title: FAO Catalogue
catalog.abstract: GeoNetwork catalog service conform to the HTTP protocol binding of the OpenGIS Catalogue Service specification version 2.0.2
